revision.text:
<languages/> <translate> <!--T:1--> {{Infobox dungeon |name = Roaring-Sea Caves |image = [[File:Roaring-Sea Caves.png|300px]] |caption = A map of Roaring-Sea Caves. |tokens = 1,730,000 |location = North of Giants Foot }}
<!--T:2--> '''Roaring-Sea Caves''' is a [[Dungeons|dungeon]] in [[Galar]]. It initially has 125 tiles arranged in two floors: 10x10 and 6x6 in size, respectively; including 16 chest tiles, 38 non-boss encounter tiles, 1 ladder tile, and 1 boss encounter tile. Wild Encounters have 32,184,888 HP.
== Encounter Tables == <!--T:3-->
===Wild Encounters=== <!--T:4-->
<!--T:5--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! colspan=2|Trainers |- ! Encounter !! Trainer !! Pokémon Team |- | [[File:Zubat.png|40px]] Zubat || rowspan=15 colspan=2| <center>N/A |- | [[File:Carbink.png|40px]] Carbink |- | [[File:Piloswine.png|40px]] Piloswine |- | [[File:Deino.png|40px]] Deino |- | [[File:Larvitar.png|40px]] Larvitar |- | [[File:Riolu.png|40px]] Riolu |- | [[File:Audino.png|40px]] Audino |- | [[File:Golbat.png|40px]] Golbat |- | [[File:Barboach.png|40px]] Barboach |- | [[File:Basculin (Red-Striped).png|40px]] Basculin (Red-Striped) |- | [[File:Basculin (Blue-Striped).png|40px]] Basculin (Blue-Striped) |- | [[File:Magikarp.png|40px]] Magikarp |- | [[File:Feebas.png|40px]] Feebas |- | [[File:Omanyte.png|40px]] Omanyte* |- | [[File:Kabuto.png|40px]] Kabuto* |} '''*Note:''' Omanyte and Kabuto will only appear if the player has captured them previously.
<!--T:6--> ===Boss Encounters=== {| class="wikitable" |- ! Wild Pokémon !! Base Health !! Boss Trainer !! Pokémon Team !! Base Health |- | [[File:Kabutops.png|50px]] Kabutops* || rowspan=5| <center>160,924,440 || rowspan=5 colspan=3|<center>N/A |- | [[File:Omastar.png|50px]] Omastar* |- | [[File:Tyranitar.png|50px]] Tyranitar |- | [[File:Hydreigon.png|50px]] Hydreigon |- | [[File:Lucario.png|50px]] Lucario |} '''*Note:''' Kabutops and Omastar will only appear if the player has captured them previously .
==Items== <!--T:7-->
<!--T:8--> {| class="wikitable" |- ! Chest Item !! Weight !! 0 Clears !! 100 Clears !! 500 Clears |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Common''' |- | {{Bag2|Greatball}} || N/A || 37.49% || 36.08% || 30.32% |- | {{Bag2|Ultraball}} || N/A || 37.49% || 36.08% || 30.32% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Rare''' |- | {{Bag2|Blue Shard}} || N/A || 10.01% || 10.52% || 12.61% |- | {{Bag2|Cyan Shard}} || N/A || 10.01% || 10.52% || 12.61% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Epic''' |- | {{Bag2|Duskball}} || N/A || 1.34% || 1.74% || 3.37% |- | {{Bag2|Medium Restore}} || N/A || 1.34% || 1.74% || 3.37% |- | {{Bag2|Large Restore}} || N/A || 1.34% || 1.74% || 3.37% |- | align="center" colspan=6| '''Legendary''' |- | {{Bag2|Revive}} || N/A || 0.17% || 0.27% || 0.67% |- | {{Bag2|Max Revive}} || N/A || 0.17% || 0.27% || 0.67% |- | {{Bag2|Hard Stone}} || N/A || 0.17% || 0.27% || 0.67% |- | {{Bag2|Star Piece}} || N/A || 0.17% || 0.27% || 0.67% |- | {{Bag2|Everstone}} || N/A || 0.17% || 0.27% || 0.67% |- | {{Bag2|Rare Bone}} || N/A || 0.17% || 0.27% || 0.67% |}
<!--T:9--> {{Galar Dungeons}} [[Category:Dungeons|^Region #8 - Galar^a]] </translate>
